title: SLA Reporting - Report on SLA Breach
description: A client has inquired about a specific high-priority ticket that they feel took too long to resolve.

tasks.description: Locate the specific ticket in the PSA tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager finds the ticket.

tasks.description: Review the ticket's audit trail and time entries to analyze its lifecycle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that while the initial response was within SLA, the resolution time breached the SLA due to waiting for a third-party vendor.

tasks.description: Prepare a root cause analysis (RCA) report for the client, explaining the reason for the delay and apologizing for the breach.
tasks.expected_outcome: A transparent RCA is provided to the client, maintaining trust despite the SLA breach.
